subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Australian golfer Geoff Ogilvy became a New York-area favorite after his U.S. Open victory at the Winged Foot Golf Club in the northern suburbs of New York City.
snippet: Australian golfer Geoff Ogilvy became a New York-area favorite after his U.S. Open victory at the Winged Foot Golf Club in the northern suburbs of New York City.
